an7.28:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an7.28:1.4: “sattime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an7.28:1.6: Kammaramata, bhassaramata, niddaramata, sanganikaramata, indriyesu aguttadvarata, bhojane amattannuta, santi kho pana sanghe sanghakaraniyani; tatra sekho bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an7.28:1.7: ‘santi kho pana sanghe thera rattannu cirapabbajita bharavahino, te tena pannayissanti’ti attana tesu yogam apajjati.
an7.28:1.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an7.28:2.1: Sattime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti.
an7.28:2.3: Na kammaramata, na bhassaramata, na niddaramata, na sanganikaramata, indriyesu guttadvarata, bhojane mattannuta, santi kho pana sanghe sanghakaraniyani; tatra sekho bhikkhu iti patisancikkhati:
an7.28:2.4: ‘santi kho pana sanghe thera rattannu cirapabbajita bharavahino, te tena pannayissanti’ti attana na tesu yogam apajjati.
an7.28:2.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
